project("monju")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libs/frut/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)

  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libs/monju.jucer"
)

  PROJECT_FILE "${monju_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "Bvz2cC"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "monju"
  PROJECT_VERSION "0.0.1"
  REPORT_JUCE_APP_USAGE ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license

    "JUCE_PLUGINHOST_VST=0"

)
